description.value: If the Dust Badger would be required to roll a Wisdom Saving throw, it may use its reaction to increase their result by one level of success. Additionally, they gain +2 to all attacks until they score a critical hit. As long as they have this bonus to attacks, they cannot use this ability.
The Dust Badger makes two Claw attacks against a creature it can reach. Both count toward its multiple attack penalty, but the penalty increases only after both attacks are made.

Requirement The Dust Badger reduces an enemy to zero hit points.

Effect The Dust Badger may Stride.

The Dust Badger shakes out its fur, releasing a cloud of spicy dust in a 15 foot radius centered on it. All creatures within the mist become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed}, and all creatures outside the mist become concealed to creatures within it. Creatures that start their turn within the cloud take Fortitude save as the spicy mixture burns their eyes and orifices. The cloud persists for 1 minute or until strong winds, such as a Gust of Wind spell, blow it away. The Dust Badger is immune to the effects of this ability.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes [[/r 2d4[poison]]]{2d4 poison damage}.

Failure The target takes 4d4 damage and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Blinded]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target takes [[/r 8d4[poison]]]{8d4 poison damage} and is blinded for 1 minute.
